page.title: 08Transport(1).
page.content:
There are two important roads in our area,the M18 and the A638 which is the old A1.The M18 joins the M1 to the {M62 and the A638}runs from Doncaster to Bawtry.There is one{minor road}the B1396 which runs from Doncaster to Haxey.There are three railway lines,the most important is the Doncaster to London East Coast{Main {Line.}There is also a line from Doncaster to Gainsborough and a mineral line which is used for{coal {traffic.}After studying the railway timetables the following imformation was discovered: North South
Diesel 18 22 (for weekday D.M.U. 5 5 trains)
H.S.T. 42 50
